Html: You gain an extra tick of Vampiric Touch when your haste is over 20.05%. So if you could apply that to the latest stat weights that would be awesome thanks.

That is not exactly how Rawr works.  At some point, what you would like to do could easily be added to the optimizer so you could put in requiring to at least have 20 haste, however that probably won't happen until we get a shadow priest developer.
